zones.name: The Coast
zones.note:
Stick to the right side following the wall
Activate Waypoint
> Go to Mud Flats first
---------------
Entrance to Tidal Island is close to Waypoint
> Go to Tidal Island for Hailrake

zones.name: The Tidal Island
zones.note:
The side without a cliff is the shortest
< Kill the Boss and Logout
+ Get Quicksilver and all gems needed for lvl 4
> TP to Submerged Passage

zones.name: The Mud Flats
zones.note:
Little rivers connect the 3 items
Pick up all 3 items
> Go to Submerged

zones.name: The Fetid Pool
zones.note:
Go in a circle and kill everything
This quest is optional and should be skipped to save time

zones.name: The Submerged Passage
zones.note:
Find Waypoint
> TP to The Coast and go to Tidal Island for Quicksilver Flask quest
---------------
Find the bridge and place a portal
We will be back for Deep Dweller boss later
> Go to The Ledge
---------------
Search below the bridge for the entrance to the Flooded Depths
> Go to Flooded Depths and kill the big crab

zones.name: The Flooded Depths
zones.note:
Kill the Deep Dweller
< Logout
+ Take reward from Tarkleigh
> TP to the Lower Prison

zones.name: The Ledge
zones.note:
Little totems at the Waypoint point to the exit
> Go to The Climb

zones.name: The Climb
zones.note:
Always be going up
Free Navali when you find her
> Proceed to the Prison

zones.name: The Lower Prison
zones.note:
> Go to town at the Waypoint
> Take the portal you left to find the Flooded Depths
---------------
There is a trial in this zone that you can do later thanks to the Waypoint
Try right first for the exit
> Go to Upper Prison
_______________
G,TRIAL:  Spike traps

zones.name: The Upper Prison
zones.note:
Try left first.
< Kill Brutus and Logout
+ Pick up Gems
> TP to the Prisoner's Gate

zones.name: Prisoner's Gate
zones.note:
Look for the side of the road that has the ledge down, usually on the right side
> Go to Ship Graveyard.

zones.name: The Ship Graveyard
zones.note:
Look for Waypoint first
If you find The Cave get the All Flame now
Otherwise continue directly to Cavern of Wrath Waypoint
---------------
At Cave:
Find Allflame and skip boss 
< Logout if you already have Cavern of Wrath, otherwise find it
> TP to Ship Graveyard
Kill Fairgraves
< Logout
Up your cold resistance (2x Sapphire ring)
+ Passive from Bestel
> TP To Cavern of Wrath

zones.name: The Cavern of Wrath
zones.note:
If you didn't find Allflame yet
> At Waypoint port back to The Ship Graveyard to find the Cave
---------------
After Allflame but before going to Merveil
> TP to town
+ Get Gems
Right time to get 2x Sapphire rings
> Go to Cavern of Wrath
---------------
> Go to Cavern of Anger

zones.name: The Cavern of Anger
zones.note:
Often bottom right
You can follow the spirits
If you see piles of gold you're close to Merveil
Kill the boss
> Go to the next Act

zones.name: The Ravaged Square
zones.note:
B,Leave a portal on start
Go right up by wall
Skip the first opening, take the second and cross the bridge (red part)
Left hand wall-follow to the Waypoint
> TP to Town
> Go back to your portal
Go down
> Proceed to Control Blocks
---------------
Move right don't cross the bridge
> Proceed to Torched Courts
---------------
After killing Avarius
> Go to the Ossuary
--------------- 
Talk with Innocence
> Proceed to the Canals

zones.name: The Control Blocks
zones.note:
Right hand wall-follow
Use movement skills to jump through fences
> Go to Arena
< Kill the Boss and Logout
> TP to Ravaged Square

zones.name: The Ossuary
zones.note:
Left hand wall follow to find the quest item and trial
The trial entrance is in the opening in the wall, the quest item is close to that opening, but you move away from the wall to find it
< Logout
G,Complete third Labyrinth and take third Ascendancy skill
> TP to the Ravaged Square
_______________
G,TRIAL - Dart traps
G,CRAFT - Chaos damage

zones.name: The Torched Courts
zones.note:
Left hand wall-follow (up)
> Go to Desecrated Chambers

zones.name: The Desecrated Chambers
zones.note:
Good place to farm some levels if needed
______________
Left hand wall-follow until you come to four pillars
Go straight and up
> Proceed to Sanctum Of Innnocence
< Kill the boss and Logout
> TP to Ravaged Square
_______________
G,CRAFT - Life/Mana

zones.name: The Reliquary
zones.note:
The Quest item is always on the edge or a corner,
it's mostly the right side
Use move skill to cross gaps

zones.name: The Canals
zones.note:
Move top left
Follow the road and cross bridges when you see them
> Go to the Feeding Trough

zones.name: The Feeding Trough
zones.note:
Move top left, there shouldn't be any diversions,
Kill Kitava!
Enjoy maps :)
_______________
G,CRAFT - Defenses 
R,RECOMMEND 3,700+ EHP, fire resist, good physical mitigations, fast movement skill

zones.name: The Fallen Courts
zones.note:
Left hand wall follow to find Dominus' office
Pick up the Key and return to Oriath for the entrance to the Haunted Reliquary in the bottom left

zones.name: The Haunted Reliquary
zones.note:
Use the key on both sides of the door to open the Vault
Kill everything then talk to Kirac in your Hideout
If you don't have a Hideout, talk to Helena in town to obtain one

zones.name: The Old Fields
zones.note:
Follow the road
Y,If you don't have second Quicksilver Flask - find the Cave and leave portal there
> Go to Crossroads

zones.name: The Den
zones.note: < Kill Great White Beast and Logout

zones.name: The Crossroads
zones.note:
Follow the road and find Waypoint
> TP to the town and go to portal into The Den
< Kill bear, Logout
---------------
> Go to Crossroads
Go north, find Chamber of Sins
---------------
Go east
> Proceed to Broken Bridge
---------------
Go south
> Proceed to Ruins

zones.name: The Chamber of Sins Level 1
zones.note:
Circle to the center of the zone
The hallway next to the Waypoint always leads to the next zone
> Go to Chamber level 2

zones.name: The Chamber of Sins Level 2
zones.note:
Trial is right then up
Boss is diagonally right and then down and left
< Kill Fidelitas and Logout
+ Get Gems
---------------
> Go to Crossroads
_______________
G,TRIAL - Sawblades

zones.name: The Broken Bridge
zones.note:
Follow the road to the right
< Kill Kraityn and Logout
> Go to Crossroads

zones.name: The Fellshrine Ruins
zones.note: Follow the road to The Crypt

zones.name: The Crypt Level 1
zones.note:
Find and complete Trial
< Logout
> Go to Riverways (left)
_______________
G,TRIAL - Spinning blades

zones.name: The Riverways
zones.note:
Follow the road and use mobility skills to jump over bridges
B,Activate Waypoint
---------------
Western Forest is next on the road
> Go to Western Forest
---------------
Wetlands is always on the opposite side of the road near the Waypoint
> Go to Wetlands

zones.name: The Western Forest
zones.note:
Follow the road
B,Activate Waypoint
Alira is on the side of the Waypoint where the road has a broken section
R,Kill Alira
---------------
Follow the road for The Way Forward quest
Kill boss, open the way back
---------------
The Weaver's Chambers can be found on the opposite side of the road from Alira, with webbed trees
> Go to Weaver's Chambers

zones.name: The Weaver's Chambers
zones.note:
Go left when the left path spawns, otherwise loop around right side
< Kill Weaver and Logout
+ Get Gems
+ 16% Two-Stone Rings
> Go to Act 1
+ Passive from Bestel
> Go to Riverways

zones.name: The Wetlands
zones.note:
Go to the left and up until the Waypoint is visible with the passage near it
< Kill Oak in center and Logout
+ 2 Passives and quest item from Eramir
> Waypoint to The Wetlands
> Go to Vaal Ruins

zones.name: The Vaal Ruins
zones.note:
Try to determine the direction then zig and zag accordingly through the ruins
> Go to Northern Forest

zones.name: The Northern Forest
zones.note:
Go to the top right by following the shoreline
> Go to The Caverns
R,! Do Not go into the Dread Thinket

zones.name: The Dread Thicket
zones.note: This zone should be skipped to save time

zones.name: The Caverns
zones.note:
Pretty much guessing where the exit spawned
B,Activate Waypoint
If you still don't have MS boots
> TP to Hideout and craft MS boots
otherwise
> Go to the Ancient Pyramid
_______________
G,CRAFT - Movement speed

zones.name: The Ancient Pyramid
zones.note:
1st exit is on right or left side from center point
Other exits are diagonal from their entrance
Y,RECOMMEND lightning resist
Kill the boss
> Go to Act 3
_______________
G,CRAFT - Spell damage

zones.name: The Slums
zones.note:
Find the grates to the sewers, then take the stairs down, follow until stairs up, then straight line to The Crematorium
> Go to Crematorium
---------------
After you  have the keys
> Go to The Sewers

zones.name: The Crematorium
zones.note:
Going left generally has a high chance of success
Y,Lightining resistance vs Piety is recommended
< Kill her and Logout
---------------
+ Check Clarissa for 2x +16 res rings and make it rare with essences
Pick up the Keys to the Sewers
---------------
> Go back to Slums
_______________
G,TRIAL - Furnace Traps
G,CRAFT - Fire damage

zones.name: The Sewers
zones.note:
Pick up the first bust before the Waypoint
B,Don't forget the Waypoint
After it is another
Right and down there is a last bust
Up and left is the exit
> Go to Marketplace
---------------
Burn the Immortal Shit
> Proceed to Ebony Barracks
_______________
G,CRAFT - Physical damage

zones.name: The Marketplace
zones.note:
Usually up and right
Go through the statue hall, get the Waypoint near The Catacombs
Skip the quest item it's bad
> Go to The Catacombs
---------------
Then right hand wall follow to find the exit
> Go to The Battlefront
_______________
G,TRIAL in Catacombs - Blade Sentries

zones.name: The Catacombs
zones.note:
_______________
G,TRIAL - Blade sentries
G,CRAFT - Ele Damage w/ Attack

zones.name: The Battlefront
zones.note:
Go up and a bit left to Waypoint.
Pick up a Spool a bit left from Waypoint.
> Go to The Docs
---------------
Move right and up looking for Solaris temple
Lvl 26 is good at this point
> Go to Solaris Temple

zones.name: The Docks
zones.note:
Skip Fairgraves
Left side first
Find the Sulphite which is down some stairs
< Logout
> Go to Battlefronts again

zones.name: The Solaris Temple Level 1
zones.note:
Follow the carpet until the exit
> Proceed to Solaris level 2

zones.name: The Solaris Temple Level 2
zones.note:
Follow the carpet but it can have dead ends
Talk to Dialla
Check your stats and figure out what amulet you need more
> TP to Sewers Waypoint
_______________
G,CRAFT - Cold damage

zones.name: The Ebony Barracks
zones.note:
Go up for Lunaris temple
B,Don't forget the Waypoint
Kill Gravicius
> Proceed to Lunaris Temple
---------------
After Lunaris temple
Go right and a bit up
> Go to Imperial Gardens

zones.name: The Lunaris Temple Level 1
zones.note: Follow the carpet, don’t forget the Waypoint

zones.name: The Lunaris Temple Level 2
zones.note:
Layout differs a lot, if you see stairs, go up these 
Find more stairs, until a larger area
There will be carts on both sides, pick the side where there is only one
< Kill boss and Logout
+ Look for 4-link at vendor
> Go to Ebony Barracks
_______________
Y,RECOMMEND lightning resist
G,CRAFT - Lightning damage

zones.name: The Imperial Gardens
zones.note:
Follow the road
B,Activate Waypoint
Go up left for a Trial
< Logout
> TP to Imperial Gardens (faster then walking back)
We are skipping library since we don't need it now
From Waypoint go to the right and then up
> Proceed to Sceptre of God
_______________
G,TRIAL - Dart Traps
G,CRAFT - All attributes

zones.name: The Library
zones.note:
Siosa will give you a quest here for all current gems
He is in the middle of the zone, near the Waypoint

zones.name: The Archives
zones.note:
The golden pages are randomly spread across the whole zone
< Logout after you have all 4
> TP back to the The Library with currency in your inventory

zones.name: The Sceptre of God
zones.note:
Exits spawn in a random corner, can often be found by travelling diagonally
> Go to Upper Sceptre of God

zones.name: The Upper Sceptre of God
zones.note:
Exits spawn in a random corner
Go up diagonally until you spot barricades at exit
Kill the boss
> Proceed to Act 4
_______________
B,RECOMMEND cold resist
Y,and lightning resist

zones.name: The Dried Lake
zones.note:
Kill Voll on one of the three spawns
< Logout
Break The Mines door seal
> Go to Mines
_______________
G,CRAFT - Attack/Cast speed

zones.name: The Mines Level 1
zones.note:
Exit is usually in top left corner
> Go to Mines lvl 2

zones.name: The Mines Level 2
zones.note:
Varied layout and many dead ends
You should look for the spirit and kill her
> Go to Crystal Veins

zones.name: The Crystal Veins
zones.note:
Loop around bottom right to go to the top left exit
Find Dialla
> Go to Town
+ Check for 4-link and good armor
Bench Craft resistance and rings
G,Ascend and take first Ascendancy skill
> TP back to Crystal Veins
---------------
> Go To Kaom (fire)
> Go to Daresso (cold)
---------------
R,IMPORTANT - Staunching Life flask
> Go to Einhar Area
Beast craft "of Staunching" on flask
> Go to Belly of the Beast
_______________
G,CRAFT - Resistance

zones.name: Daresso's Dream
zones.note:
Move towards the top right, some dead ends
> Go to Grand Arena

zones.name: Kaom's Dream
zones.note:
Follow passages and bridges
> Go to Kaom's Stronghold

zones.name: The Grand Arena
zones.note:
If you have not done Kaom's Dream yet, take waypoint to Crystal Veins and do that first
Move down left from Waypoint, then follow path
< Kill Daresso and Logout
> TP To Crystal Veins
_______________
B,RECOMMEND cold resist

zones.name: Kaom's Stronghold
zones.note:
If you have not done Daresso's Dream yet, take waypoint to Crystal Veins and do that first
Follow stairs and bridges
_______________
R,RECOMMEND fire resist

zones.name: The Belly of the Beast Level 1
zones.note:
Aim for top left, many dead ends
R,Watch out for bleeding
> Go to level 2

zones.name: The Belly of the Beast Level 2
zones.note:
Aim for top left, many dead ends
Kill the boss
> Proceed to The Harvest
_______________
G,CRAFT - Chaos damage

zones.name: The Harvest
zones.note:
Always one boss on right side, two left
---------------
Talk with Piety
> Proceed to the Black Core
< Kill boss and Logout
+ Get Gems
Go to the top right side
> Proceed to the Ascent
_______________
Maligaro does physical so keep moving
G,Stay in green aura against Doedre
Y,Shavronne deals lightning
R,Malachi deals fire damage

zones.name: The Ascent
zones.note:
G,TIP: dirty roads lead to exits
Go up and left
Сross the bridge
Go up and right
small passage to the exit
> Go to Act 5
_______________
G,CRAFT - Ailment, Stun and Curse Mitigation

zones.name: The Control Blocks
zones.note:
Go top left for the Miasmeter, then up and right
Kill boss for his "eyes"
+ Get Silver Flask as reward
Use it for speed boost often
> Go to Oriath's Square

zones.name: Oriath Square
zones.note:
Go top right until you cross the bridge, then down
> Go to Templar Courts

zones.name: The Templar Courts
zones.note:
Loop around clockwise
> Go to the Chamber of Innocence

zones.name: The Chamber of Innocence
zones.note:
Perfect zone to level up if needed
Go up and left, and spiral counter clockwise
> Go to Sanctum of Innocence
---------------
Check Waypoint
Talk to Bannon
> Go to Torched Courts
_______________
G,CRAFT - Movement speed
Y,RECOMMEND lightning resist
R,and fire resist

zones.name: The Torched Courts
zones.note:
Loop around counter clockwise
> Go to Ruinned Square

zones.name: The Ruined Square
zones.note:
Proceed to Waypoint
> Go into Ossuary
---------------
Proceed to middle of the map
B,Leave portal near big fountain.
> Go down to Reliquary
---------------
Move up from portal
> Go to Cathedral Rooftop

zones.name: The Ossuary
zones.note:
Loop around clockwise
Pick up a sign
< Logout
> TP to the Ruined Square
_______________
G,CRAFT - Physical damage

zones.name: The Reliquary
zones.note:
Start from down left
Find multiple quest items in corners of the zone
Go back to Waypoint
> Waypoint to Town
> Go to your portal
_______________
G,CRAFT - Accuracy

zones.name: The Cathedral Rooftop
zones.note:
Consider running your first Labyrinth here if you still have not
Run top left and kill Kitava!
_______________
R,RECOMMEND fire resist
with 1,500+ EHP

zones.name: The Coast
zones.note:
Go to the right side of the zone and go to the top right corner
Activate Waypoint
> Go to Mud Flats

zones.name: The Tidal Island
zones.note: This zone should be skipped to save time

zones.name: The Mud Flats
zones.note:
Kill the Dishonoured Queen (1) on the right side
Pick up the key from Queen
Open the gate to the next zone (2) on the left side
> Go to Karui Fortress

zones.name: The Karui Fortress
zones.note:
Follow the right hand side
Kill Tukohama
Exit on left side and go up
> Proceed to the Ridge
_______________
G,CRAFT - Defences
R,RECOMMEND fire resist
with 1,500+ EHP

zones.name: The Ridge
zones.note:
Follow the path until you can go right,
then follow that until you have a path up left
> Go to the Lower Prison

zones.name: The Lower Prison
zones.note:
You usually want to go down or left towards the exit
Get the Waypoint
> Go to Shavronne's Tower
_______________
G,TRIAL - Spike traps
G,CRAFT - Double resistance

zones.name: Shavronne's Tower
zones.note:
Follow the halls, going over bridges, for 4 minizones
> Go up to Prison Rooftop
Kill boss
> Go left to the Warden's Chamber
Pickup recipe
< Logout.
+ Take rewards (4-link)
> TP To Prisoner's Gate
_______________
G,CRAFT - Spell damage
Y,RECOMMEND lightning resist
with physical mitigation

zones.name: Prisoner's Gate
zones.note:
Go down the side of the road that has the cliff
Fight the Abberath
Follow the road into the next area
> Go to the Western Forest
_______________
R,RECOMMEND fire resist

zones.name: The Riverways
zones.note:
Pick up Waypoint
Follow the path up at the Waypoint
> Go to Wetlands
---------------
Follow the road and when you reach the encampment go down and right
> Go to Southern Forest

zones.name: The Wetlands
zones.note:
Stick to the left hand side to find the entrance to the Spawning Ground
Kill the boss
< Logout
B,Perfect time to cap cold resist
> TP to Riverways
_______________
G,RECOMMEND current life flasks, avoid chaos degens

zones.name: The Western Forest
zones.note:
Follow the road to the Riverways
> Go to Riverways
_______________
G,CRAFT - Attributes (in Alira's camp)

zones.name: The Southern Forest
zones.note:
Follow the right and a bit up to The Cavern of Anger
> Go to Cavern of Anger

zones.name: The Cavern of Anger
zones.note:
B,Dont forget the black flag upon entering this zone
Go down then up, then go right, the exit can be up or down
> Go to the Beacon

zones.name: The Beacon
zones.note:
Follow the shoreline until you reach the beacons
Move the two columns
Burn the flag
> Go to the Brine King's Reef
_______________
G,CRAFT - Life/Mana

zones.name: The Brine King's Reef
zones.note:
Follow the left hand shoreline to the Brine King's arena
< Kill the boss and Logout
Talk with vendors
> Go to Act 7 from Waypoint
_______________
Y,RECOMMEND lightning resist
B,and cold resist

zones.name: The Crossroads
zones.note:
B,Don’t forget the Waypoint
Go right down from Waypoint to (1) The Fellshrine Ruins
> Proceed to Fellshrine Ruins
---------------
Go left from Waypoint to (2) The Chamber of Sins
> Proceed to The Chamber of Sins

zones.name: The Fellshrine Ruins
zones.note:
Follow the road
Go down right until the end 
Then go up right
> Go to the Crypt

zones.name: The Crypt
zones.note:
Open the sarcophagus for Crypt level 2
Manually switch to Crypt 2 layout
> Go to the Crypt 2
_______________
G,TRIAL - Spinning blades
G,CRAFT - Damage over time

zones.name: The Chamber of Sins Level 1
zones.note:
Loop around to the center, then activate the Waypoint
Use your map from the Crypt in the map device
> Go through the portals
---------------
After killing Maligaro
Go through the hall behind the Waypoint to find the exit
> Go To Chamber Level 2
_______________
G,CRAFT - Lightning damage

zones.name: Maligaro's Sanctum
zones.note:
Follow the edges of the zone, and cross the bridges you encounter until you find the arena (Maligaro's Workshop)
B,Use a portal scroll before the fight 
Kill the boss
> Go back to portal out to Silk
_______________
Y,RECOMMEND lightning resist

zones.name: The Chamber of Sins Level 2
zones.note:
Go to the top right side until you find the narrow long hallway
If you encounter a dead end when going to the top right, do a right hand wall-follow instead
Loop clockwise around the final room
Click the wall to reveal the exit
> Go to the Den
_______________
G,TRIAL - Sawblades (left side)
G,CRAFT - Mana regen

zones.name: The Den
zones.note:
Go to the top left or right to find the exit
> Go to The Ashen Fields

zones.name: The Ashen Fields
zones.note:
Follow the road down to the left
Kill Greust
> Go to the Northern Forest
_______________
R,RECOMMEND Bleed removal

zones.name: The Northern Forest
zones.note:
Wall-follow the left/up side for The Dread Thicket
> Go to the Dread Thicket
---------------
Wall-follow the right side for The Causeway
> Go to the Causeway

zones.name: The Dread Thicket
zones.note:
Explore the zone and find the fireflies
Find a cave
> Go to the Den of Despair
Kill Gruthkul
---------------
> Go back to Thicket
Finish collecting fireflies
> Go to the Northern Forest
_______________
G,CRAFT - Fire damage

zones.name: The Causeway
zones.note:
Go top right to the exit
Loot Kishara's star at exit
> Go to Vaal City
_______________
G,CRAFT - Cold damage

zones.name: The Vaal City
zones.note:
Find and follow the thick walls to guide you to the exit
Activate Waypoint
> Go to Town
Take all rewards
> Go back to Vaal City
> Proceed to the Temple of Decay

zones.name: The Temple of Decay Level 1
zones.note:
Long zone with multiple levels
Go diagonally to exits
> Go to Level 2
Kill boss
> Go to act 8
_______________
G,CRAFT - Accuracy
Y,RECOMMEND lightning resist

zones.note:
Watch the black paint on the floor as you enter the zone to see in which direction it points you
Move through zone
> Go to Doedre's Cesspool
_______________

zones.name: Doedre's Cesspool
zones.note:
Find the path that doesn't have a dead end, this leads you all the way to the exit
> Proceed to Cauldron via Loose Grate
Kill Doedre
Activate Waypoint
> Go left to The Grand Promenade
---------------
Go right
> Proceed to The Quay

G,CRAFT - Resistance

zones.name: The Grand Promenade
zones.note:
Wall-follow the right side
> Go to the Bath House

zones.name: The Bath House
zones.note:
Activate Waypoint and Go right
Kill Hector and pickup quest item
> Go up to the High Gardens
---------------
After Yughul, go to opposite side for Trial
Go down and right
> Proceed to Lunaris Concourse

G,CRAFT - Flask duration

zones.name: The High Gardens
zones.note:
Be careful when killing Porcupines
Follow path to the end to kill Yugul
_______________
B,RECOMMEND cold resist

zones.name: The Lunaris Concourse
zones.note:
Go up and right for Waypoint
Move up and left for entrance to Lunaris Temple first
> Proceed to Lunaris Temple
---------------
Go down and right
> Proceed to the Harbour Bridge

zones.name: The Lunaris Temple Level 1
zones.note:
Follow the carpets until end
Activate the Waypoint
> Go to Level 2

zones.name: The Lunaris Temple Level 2
zones.note:
Look for staircases and go up these
When you reach the larger area
Look for vases on the opposite wall and pick the side where there is only one
< Kill the boss and Logout
G,Complete second Labyrinth and take second Ascendancy skill
> TP to Doedre's Cesspool
_______________
G,CRAFT - Minions
B,RECOMMEND cold resist

zones.name: The Quay
zones.note:
Go to the bottom left
Pick up the quest item at (1) 
Go to the bottom right
> Go to Resurrection Site
Kill boss
> Leave the arena
Go up right sticking along bottom edge
> Go to Grain Gate

zones.name: The Grain Gate
zones.note:
This zone has many buildings
Only enter and leave buildings through openings that have a guard's corpse next to it; they lead the way
R,Kill the gemlings legion (near book)
> Go to Imperial Fields

zones.name: The Imperial Fields
zones.note:
Follow the road until the end 
Continue going that direction
> Go to Solaris Temple

zones.name: The Solaris Concourse
zones.note: Follow the carpets to the Harbour Bridge

zones.name: The Solaris Temple Level 1
zones.note:
Go down and left
Then up and left
The Waypoint is always on the path
> Go to Solaris level 2

zones.name: The Solaris Temple Level 2
zones.note:
Y,Here is when Chaos recipe starts
Follow the carpets
< Kill the boss and Logout
> Waypiont to Lunaris Concourse
_______________
G,CRAFT - Traps and mines
R,RECOMMEND fire resist

zones.name: The Harbour Bridge
zones.note:
Y,At this point, make sure you are doing the Chaos recipe
Go up and to the middle to the arena
> Proceed to arena
Kill the bosses
> Go to Act 9
_______________
R,RECOMMEND fire resist
B,and cold resist

zones.name: The Descent
zones.note:
Go up right to the supply hoist
Then down left to another hoist
Then up right to The Vastiri Desert
> Go to Vastiri Desert

zones.name: The Vastiri Desert
zones.note:
Go right to the Waypoint
< Find the Chest with Mummies
Go right to (2) for The Oasis
Then get the quest item in town
> Enter Oasis
---------------
Then top (1) for the Foothills
> Proceed to the Foothills
_______________
G,CRAFT - Attack/Cast speed

zones.name: The Oasis
zones.note:
Left or right wall follow, based on bottom or top being the dead end at the entrance
< Kill boss and Logout
> TP to the Vastiri Desert
_______________
R,RECOMMEND physical mitigation

zones.name: The Foothills
zones.note:
Go top right first
B,Don't forget to touch the Waypoint
> Go right to The Boiling Lake (1)
---------------
Find big Centaur (up from waypoint)
Kill him and pick up a quest item
Go up to (2) for The Tunnel
> Proceed to The Tunnel

zones.name: The Boiling Lake
zones.note:
Go to the top right of zone
If you spot petrified men you are close
< Kill the boss and Logout
> TP to The Foothills
Go to the top left corner of the zone
_______________
G,CRAFT - Spell damage

zones.name: The Tunnel
zones.note:
Go up and left for Trial
Then go to the right and up the path
Activate Waypoint
> Proceed to the Quarry
_______________
G,TRIAL - Blade sentries
G,CRAFT - All attributes

zones.name: The Quarry
zones.note:
Activate Waypoint at center
Go right side
> Proceed to Refinery
---------------
Go left side (probably left up)
> Proceed to Shrine of the Winds
< Kill the boss and Logout
Get Rewards
> TP to the Quarry
Talk to Sin and unlock the next zone
> Proceed to the Belly of the Beast
_______________
G,CRAFT - Physical damage
R,RECOMMEND physical mitigation
3,000+ EHP and Movement skills

zones.name: The Refinery
zones.note:
Follow the cart tracks to the building top left for Boss
< Kill the Boss and Logout
> TP to The Quarry
_______________
Y,RECOMMEND lightning resist

zones.name: The Belly of the Beast
zones.note:
Head top left in this zone and the next
> Proceed to Rotting Core

zones.name: The Rotting Core
zones.note:
Kill Doedre, Maligaro, and Shavronne again
Enter the Black Heart
Kill the Depraved Trinity
> Go to Act 10
_______________
Y,RECOMMEND lightning resist
3,200+ EHP and fast movement skill
